publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6892 David Whitton: Young Business of the Yearâ€”That the Parliament congratulates young entrepreneur Gillian Dick of Bearsden on winning Young Business of the Year at the 2010 Association of Scottish Businesswomen Awards and notes that she has also been shortlisted as a finalist in the Glasgow Business Awards for the best use of social media for her online directory, Find Me Glasgow.
S3M-6892 Young Business of the Year (lodged on 1 September 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-6892 Young Business of the Year (lodged on 1 September 2010) David Stewart*
